column4: ive also tried the book thing.....but i have found that these IRC rooms are a greater help than any book could be
how can i tell if firestarter is running or not?
i thought it was a firewall
it doesn't really run. it just applies iptables rules to the kernel
distrowatch counts page hits, how many people look at the distro pages. no-one knows usage statistics :)
true   but even if half of the hits are actual downloaders   then it still works out we are on top
